summary:
Regulus glaring at his brother after hearing McGonagall say “Your house will be like your family”.
Sirius rolling his eyes along...
body:
Regulus glaring at his brother after hearing McGonagall say “Your house will be like your family”.

Sirius rolling his eyes along with James, who sees, but secretly wishing that brotherly love would mean more to Regulus than family pride.

The other Marauders fiercely guarding Sirius in the corridors in case Regulus tries to hex him.

Regulus feeling crushed that Sirius would ever think he would harm him, no matter what the outcome of the Sorting Ceremony was.

summary: J.K. Rowling delights happy couple by crashing Edinburgh wedding
title: J.K. Rowling delights happy couple by crashing Edinburgh wedding
body:
She might not have had an official invite, but J.K. Rowling was made more than welcome nonetheless at a wedding in Edinburgh over the weekend.

Grooms Nick and John tied the knot at the handsome Prestonfield House, where the Harry Potter writer just happened to be having lunch.

She was happy to pose for a series of snaps by wedding photographer Matt Fothergill, who then stuck a selection on Facebook.

Nick commented that he was ‘flabbergasted at her being there’.

Fothergill told Deadline News (via Metro) that the pair were ‘bleeping like Beaker from the Muppets’ in sheer excitement.

He added to Pink News: “[Nick and John] were looking over my shoulder and looking quite excited.

“Then, they rushed towards me and said in very hushed tones something like, ‘JK Rowling is right behind you’ and then we joked about how cool it would be to have her in a wedding photo.

“I swallowed some serious nerves and ran up, fanboyed a smidge and asked as politely as I could if she wouldn’t mind posing for a quick picture with the boys as it was their wedding day.

“She was just delightful from start to finish. She turned and smiled, strode over and gave them both the biggest hugs and wished them the greatest of health and happiness.

“It was such a wonderful surreal beautiful moment.

“We laughed about it for about half an hour afterwards. Nick’s face in the pictures kind of gave away how starstruck we all were, I think. I actually squealed with delight when she was still within earshot.”

In a post on Facebook, Fothergill, who identifies as Hufflepuff, added: “I think there’s definitely that saying ‘Never meet you heroes…’ as in ‘don’t meet your idols’ as they can never live up to the hype and you will inevitably feel let down.

“I can safely say this was not one of those occasions.”

Read more
A brief history of ‘Predator’
The ‘creepy’ Snow White fan theory
Kevin Smith loses 51lbs in six months

caption:
YOUR FAVORITE CHARACTER IS DEAD.

POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 14+ YEARS

Did you grow up loving Harry Potter? Are you ready for a world of Harry Potter that grew up with you, with more grit and realism and endless creative freedom? You’re looking for JACFC! We’ve begun some SITE EVENTS (a mysterious sickness is affecting the magical ability of witches and wizards!) and now’s the time to join to get involved! If you’re not sure where to begin, we’ve got loads of flexible, diverse CHARACTER REQUESTS waiting.

blog.title: - Ginneeweasley -
blog.description: Izzy Clara. 28 years old. Wendat. Proud member of the Ginny Weasley Defense Squad. Main blog : feelsandotps. Let's be honest, this blog is mostly about the novels that came out of the incredible mind of J.K. Rowling (both the Wizarding World and her adult novels (majorly the Harry Potter series and the Strike series). If you're anti-JKR and/or anti-Cursed Child, do us both a favor and just go back the other way.

tags: I hate Peter Pettigrew as much as the next person for what he did
but i refuse to diminish the tragedy of what happened to save my feelings
summary: Friendly reminder that in real Harry Potter canon (see Prisoner of Azkaban), Sirius suspected Remus and Remus suspected Sirius...
body:
Friendly reminder that in real Harry Potter canon (see Prisoner of Azkaban), Sirius suspected Remus and Remus suspected Sirius before even beginning to think to suspect Peter. The Marauders loved Peter deeply as a brother, he was totally a part of the group and not an outsider following them around like a pet.

THIS is why his betrayal was so total and awful and hurt everybody so hard. It is betraying who James, Sirius and Remus were to pretend that they didn’t love Peter as much as they did. Stop trying to pretend otherwise just because “i don’t wanna see this horrible traitor as being close to them, it hurts”, that’s the whole bloody point of the Marauders’s tragedy !!!!!

reblog.comment:
Friendly reminder that in real Harry Potter canon (see Prisoner of Azkaban), Sirius suspected Remus and Remus suspected Sirius before even beginning to think to suspect Peter. The Marauders loved Peter deeply as a brother, he was totally a part of the group and not an outsider following them around like a pet.

THIS is why his betrayal was so total and awful and hurt everybody so hard. It is betraying who James, Sirius and Remus were to pretend that they didn’t love Peter as much as they did. Stop trying to pretend otherwise just because “i don’t wanna see this horrible traitor as being close to them, it hurts”, that’s the whole bloody point of the Marauders’s tragedy !!!!!

THIS is why his betrayal was so total and awful and hurt everybody so hard. It is betraying who James, Sirius and Remus were to pretend that they didn’t love Peter as much as they did. Stop trying to pretend otherwise just because “i don’t wanna see this horrible traitor as being close to them, it hurts”, that’s the whole bloody point of the Marauders’s tragedy !!!!!

THIS is why his betrayal was so total and awful and hurt everybody so hard. It is betraying who James, Sirius and Remus were to pretend that they didn’t love Peter as much as they did. you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

blog.name: fougeremalefique
blog.title: PineappleSnape !
blog.description: There’s no need to be nice to become a hero.

summary: What people don’t understand is that it isn’t his job to look after Harry. It isn’t his job to save people. He doesn’t have to...
body: What people don’t understand is that it isn’t his job to look after Harry. It isn’t his job to save people. He doesn’t have to try to save Lupin, Ginny, Neville, Harry, and many other people, but he does it anyway, by love for Lily. Nobody denies that. (Note that he put himself in danger when he tries to save someone). The whole point « yes but if he didn’t love Lily » is absurd. The fact is, he loved her, and he joined Dumbledore’s side and tried to save her by love for her, fought against Voldemort, spied and protected her son (and many other people) because he loved her. He dedicated his entire life to the cause she believed in. Why people try to belittle every single thing that he did because he did it by love ? Many people changed by love throughout the série, and wouldn’t have changed if they didn’t love. Like Regulus, narcissa, dumbledore, etc.

He doesn’t have to try to save Lupin, Ginny, Neville, Harry, and many other people, but he does it anyway, by love for Lily. Nobody denies that. (Note that he put himself in danger when he tries to save someone). The whole point « yes but if he didn’t love Lily » is absurd. The fact is, he loved her, and he joined Dumbledore’s side and tried to save her by love for her, fought against Voldemort, spied and protected her son (and many other people) because he loved her. He dedicated his entire life to the cause she believed in. Why people try to belittle every single thing that he did because he did it by love ? Many people changed by love throughout the série, and wouldn’t have changed if they didn’t love. Like Regulus, narcissa, dumbledore, etc.

blog.name: ununquadius
blog.title: Drarry Chats (Mostly)
blog.description: AO3: ununquadius  // Follows, comments and likes from azaharperezoso Feel free to correct my mistakes, English is not my first language | Header by @cubedcoffeecake

summary:
Draco: We're like Beauty and the Beast
Harry: Because you were a prat to me, then you help me with the Death Eaters, changed...
body:
Draco: We're like Beauty and the Beast
Harry: Because you were a prat to me, then you help me with the Death Eaters, changed your attitude, and started being nice?
Draco: No, because I'm beautiful and you're like a beast with no manners

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: We're like Beauty and the Beast

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: Because you were a prat to me, then you help me with the Death Eaters, changed your attitude, and started being nice?

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: No, because I'm beautiful and you're like a beast with no manners

summary: Harry Potter Oc
title: Harry Potter Oc
body:
Personal Information:

Full Name: Mortem Lillian Blue

Nicknames: Mort, Lily, momo

Gender: Female

Birth Date: November 30

Star Sign: Sagittarius

Nationality: British

Species: Human

Blood type: A

Dominant Hand: Left

Sexual preference: Male and female

Physical Information:

Hair Colour: Black

Hair Length: Medium, till shoulders

Hair Style: Wavy

Eye Colour: Green

Skin Colour: Pale

Height: 6"

Body Shape: curvy

                                          Extra Physical Information:

Makeup: eyeliner (at times)

Jewellery: A golden snitch necklace

Piercings: Snakebites

Tattoos: None

Scars: A scar on her left upper arm, she got a very bad cut from Quidditch practice

Scent: Mint

                                                       Outfit Choices:

Clothing Style: Punk

School Uniform: Her Hogwarts robes, Her Gryffindor tie loose and normal black boots

Weekend Outfits: Black metalica t-shirt with either a leather jacket or a trench coat

Night Outfits: Shorts and t-shirts with a plaid jacket

Swimwear: Black swimsuit

Formal Wear: Tie tied neatly, a blouse, heels and jeans

Yule Ball Dress/Suit: A red and gold puffy dress a bit under the knees with sneakers

Hairstyle: down

Jewellery: none

                                                        Any Extra Accessories:

Slug Club Christmas Party: didn’t go, didn’t care

Christmas Dress: tank top and leather jacket

Hairstyle: ponytail

Jewellery: none

Shoes: sneakers

                                         Any Extra Accessories:

Character’s Own Wedding: Never got married

                                      Psychological Information:

Personality: very fuck you-ish, brave and loyal, mostly chill, sometimes veryyyyy hyper,
very self-centred at times and can be very selfish

Habits: smoking, biting nails

Likes: Books, reading, Quidditch, ice tea, alcohol, weed

Dislikes: Show offs, liers, candy, hot tea, the colour pink, any other drug

Hobbies: Quidditch, reading, drawing

Fears: Werewolves, hippogriffs, snakes (her little sister), Azkaban

Talents: Drawing, photography, writing quickly

Passions: Quidditch, Photography, gaming

Strengths: pep talks, writing, socializing

Weakness: too brave which makes her very self-centred, gossips a ton, egoistic

Favourite Things: Quidditch

Favourite Colour: Yellow

Favourite Food: Cereal

Favourite Drink: Vodka

Favourite Sweet: chocolate

Favourite Smell: Mint, books

Favourite Flower: Lily flower

Favourite Animal: German shepherds

Favourite Season: Fall

Favourite Weather: rain

Favourite Movie: grease

Wizarding School: Hogwarts

Hogwarts House: Gryffindor

Blood Purity: half

Parseltongue: Nah

Metamorphangus: nope ;(

Thestral Visibility: Yes, she saw her mother drown because of her father who
is sentenced to life in Azkaban

Owns a House Elf: No

Quidditch: Beater

Animagus: Nope, still trying tho

Boggart: Her Father

Patronus: Panda

Amortentia: Mint, books,

Mirror of Erised: Herself surrounded by a caring new family

Gringott’s Bank Vault: 1130 is protected by a dragon

                                                    Wand Information:

Wand Wood: Duke

Wand Core: dragon heartstring

Wand Length:14"

Wand Flexibility: not very flexible

Wand Reaction when first held: yellow sparks flew

                                                      Pet Information:

Name: Canis

Nickname: Canny

Species/Breed:  German Shepherd

Gender: Male

Fur Colours: golden brown and black as the main colour

Fur Texture: rough but soft

Eye Colour: black

Markings: none

Height: 60 cm

Weight: 40 kg

Personality: Fun, intelligent, loyal, protecting

Special/Magical Abilities: teleports

How Character Became Owner Of Pet: Mortem was always scared of dogs, but her
mother (who was alive at that time) told her, that it would be fine. Mortem asked
the employee on what she suggests, the employee got a small little German shepherd
puppy and mortem walked up to him and took a deep breath and held it up.
She told her mom she wants it, they’ve been best friends ever since

                                                    School Information:

Best Classes: Astronomy and Quidditch

Worst Class: Herbology

Favourite Class: Astronomy

Favourite Teacher: Madam Hooch

Least Favourite Teacher: Slughorn

Favourite Spell: Lumos

Favourite Potion: Polyjuice Potion

Favourite Place: forbidden forest or quidditch pitch

School Reputation: bad

                                                  O.W.L.
                           (Ordinary Wizarding Levels)
                                [O: Outstanding I E: Exceeds Expectations I
                                 A: Acceptable I P: Poor I D: Dreadful I T: Troll]

                                     Core Subjects

Astronomy: O

Charms: A

Dark Arts: E

Defence Against The Dark Arts:  A

Herbology: P

History Of Magic: P

Potions: A

Transfiguration: A

                               Elective Subjects (Third Years and up)

Alchemy: P

Arithmancy:-

Care Of Magical Creatures: A

Divination: A

Muggle Studies: -

Study Of Ancient Runes: -

                                                      Relationship Information:

Friends: Nalia and Nani

Best Friend(s): Lu

Enemies: Most Slytherins and Hufflepuffs

Worst Enemy: Her little sister and her best friend

Past Relationship(s): None

First Kiss: Lu

Crushing on Her: Lu

Yule Ball Date: None

Slug Club Christmas Party Date: She didn’t go

Current Boyfriend/Girlfriend: None

Love Interests: Lu

                                            Background Information:

Birth Place: London

Fluent languages: French, English, Spanish

                                                           Family:

Father: Maylon Blue (alive)
Mother: Martha Blue (dead)
Brother: none
Sister: Little sister Raven (alive)

Family Blood: Half
Family Reputation: unknown

The OC template is by Rose Bloom on Quotev

Critique is welcome

summary: Il commiato dei Dursley
title: Il commiato dei Dursley
excerpt: La notizia della morte di suo cugino arrivò ad incrinare quell’equilibrio così difficilmente riconquistato. La scomparsa dei genitori, e la sua obesità, avevano condannato Dudley ad una morte prema…
